A Psalm of Asaph. God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.<RF>of Asaph: or, for Asaph<Rf>
How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.<RF>Defend: Heb. Judge<Rf>
Deliver the poor and needy: rid <FI>them<Fi> out of the hand of the wicked.
They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.<RF>outâ€¦: Heb. moved<Rf><CM>
I have said, Ye <FI>are<Fi> gods; and all of you <FI>are<Fi> children of the most High.
But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.<CM>
